page.title: 15Typical Sunday For 12yr Old
page.content:
KATHRYN FEATHER - up at 8.30,mostly stays in. At 12 noon she has a snack meal. Usually goes out with her family for an hour, then she may stay in or play out if it is fine until between 6 and 7o'clock. She plays out for an hour and then watches TV until 10-10.30p.m.
SHAJNA BEGUM(Muslim parents) - up at 8.30, plays out with friends until dinner, 12,00 snack. Watches TV until 3-4.00p.m. then helps mum do housework Bed at 11-12 o'clock.
ANDREW CARR - up at 6.45 a.m, watches TV until 9.00a.m. then goes out on his BMX. Dinner at 12.45 p.m. then waits for his friend to phone. Plays out with his friend until tea at 5.00p.m. Plays out till 7 when he goes in to watch TV till bed at 9.30p.m.
